amendment.description: To provide adequate funding of $1.4 billion in fiscal year 2006 to preserve a national intercity passenger rail system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 158 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 51.

action.text: Amendment SA 158 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S2694-2706; text: CR S2694) To provide adequate funding of $1.4 billion in fiscal year 2006 to preserve a national intercity passenger rail system.
